ing: 10 fluid ounces milk, or to taste
des: "An easy, warm rum and milk drink for a lazy, rainy day. This recipe invites customization to taste. Use more or less of any ingredient."
ins:
Fill a microwave-safe mug with milk; stir in brown sugar and vanilla extract.
Heat milk mixture in microwave until almost boiling, about 1 minute. Stir rum into milk mixture and float butter on top; sprinkle with nutmeg.
